discourse_list.title: Proposal to parcially delegate your voting power

content.content: Hello together, this is my first post and I am quite new to the Optimism Collective so bear with me. For the first time I just wanted to delegate my voting power and thus I’ve read through the different Delegates and their proposals. It then came to my mind that I want to support different delegates, since I support more than just one delegate and their visions, however it is not possible. In order to do so I have to use different addresses which is quite a hassle to be honest. Now, that’s why I come here to propose this option. Is this possible to add this feature in the future? PS: Just to be clear what I mean here is an example: Lets assume I have 10k OP to delegate and I like  the proposals and visions of Delegate A and Delegate B and thus want to support them each with 50% (5k) of my voting power instead of giving it to just one.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is proposing a new feature to partially delegate voting power to multiple delegates. The post explains the author's reasoning for the proposal and asks if it is possible to add this feature in the future. A 3rd party could give constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: There’s an active grant proposal offering to do just this. I think you’re going to like it.     [REVIEW] [GF: Phase 1 Proposal] Agora Governance Fund: Phase 1       Project Name: Agora  Author name and contact info: Charlie Feng (https://twitter.com/charliecfeng; charlie@voteagora.com)  I understand that I will be required to provide additional KYC information to the Optimism Foundation to receive this grant: Yes  L2 recipient address: 0x0e2cd794602152772a19c5eb7bf221ccafdabd9d  Which Voting Cycle are you applying for?: Phase 1  Grant category: Tooling  Is this proposal applicable to a specific committee? Yes. This proposal falls under the Tooling/Infrastru…

content.content: Very nice, thanks for the heads-up.
Would love to get your feedback as we build and see how we can help! Exciting to hear that the problem is shared and resonates.
Welcome, Apart from delegating, I hope you keep sharing your thoughts and actively participate in governance.
Will do my best. The more I learn about OP the more it excites me.
Will do so and let you know.
